item.title: By: Roger Leite
item.dc:creator: Roger Leite
item.description: Great tips Gustavo! Questioning good things is a great chance to understand what works better for team and one more thing, which habits the team have to maintain or build to always improve speed, quality etc.
item.content:encoded: Great tips Gustavo! Questioning good things is a great chance to understand what works better for team and one more thing, which habits the team have to maintain or build to always improve speed, quality etc.
